entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow and local blowing snow beginning this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
